skillTree.name: Oath of Forging
skillTree.description: To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.

skillTree.name: Obstinacy
skillTree.description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Steam-Powered Economy
skillTree.description: The Guild of Engineers provides other Guilds with state-of-the-art machines and tools that dramatically increase the efficiency of any construction project

effects.description:
Construction time: -15% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction time: -25% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Runic Artillery
skillTree.description: The addition of the Rune of Fire to any war machine makes it extremely useful against trolls, spirits of the forests or many kinds of undead

skillTree.name: Field Repairs
skillTree.description: During a campaign, a Guildmaster will always make sure to have all tools, supplies and crew needed to keep their artillery working for a very long time.

effects.description:
Replenishment: +20% for Artillery and Flying units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Eagle Eyed
skillTree.description: Nothing can escape the Guildmaster's eyes and he has the ammo to hit it

skillTree.name: Battle Hardened
skillTree.description: The Guildmaster has lived through more than his fair share of tavern brawls

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Who needs cavalry when you have stout Dwarven legs

skillTree.name: Brimstone Rifle
skillTree.description: The Guildmaster's rifle is a true example of his craft

skillTree.name: Dead Eye
skillTree.description: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Trollhammer Torpedoes (Guildmaster Variant)
skillTree.description: The Guildmaster equips his personalised drakegun to fire the deadly Trollhammer Torpedoes at unfortunate foes.

skillTree.name: Flamethrower (Guildmaster Variant)
skillTree.description: The Guildmaster equips his personalised flamethrower to eject highly flammable substances across the battlefield, raining molten death upon the enemy.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Optimised Aim
skillTree.description: To the left... just one more inch... Fire!

effects.description: Enables 'Optimised Aim' granting bonus accuracy to units around the Guildmaster

skillTree.name: Superior Alloys
skillTree.description: The Guilds of Weaponsmiths, Armoursmiths and Engineers sometimes work together to improve their Clans-kin´s tools of war

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +3% for Miner, Warrior and Longbeard units
	(Lord's army)

"Armour: +3 for Miner, Warrior and Longbeard units"
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for Miner, Warrior and Longbeard units

	(Lord's army)

"Armour: +10 for Miner, Warrior and Longbeard units"
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: First Rank, Fire! Second Rank, Fire!
skillTree.description: Dont let any grobi reach our lines!

effects.description:
Missile Strength: +4% for ranged Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +5% for ranged Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +8% for ranged Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +10% for ranged Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +12% for ranged Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +15% for ranged Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tested and Reliable
skillTree.description: Not everything new is bad, but Dwarfs never stop improving their oldest weapons

effects.description:
"Missile damage: +4% for Gyrocopters, Gyrobombers, Bolt Throwers and Grudge Throwers"
	(Lord's army)

"Range: +3% for Gyrocopters, Gyrobombers, Bolt Throwers and Grudge Throwers"
	(Lord's army)

"Missile damage: +8% for Gyrocopters, Gyrobombers, Bolt Throwers and Grudge Throwers"

"Missile damage: +12% for Gyrocopters, Gyrobombers, Bolt Throwers and Grudge Throwers"
	(Lord's army)

"Range: +9% for Gyrocopters, Gyrobombers, Bolt Throwers and Grudge Throwers"
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Alchemical Fury
skillTree.description: No dragon can breath a flame hotter than this one

effects.description:
Missile damage: +4% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannons
	(Lord's army)

Range: +4% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannons
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +8% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannons
	(Lord's army)

Range: +8% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannons
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +12% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannons
	(Lord's army)

Range: +12% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannons
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Consummate Craftmanship
skillTree.description: It´s Dwarf-crafted! What did you expect?

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +3% for Slayer, Hammerer and Ironbreaker units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +3 for Slayers, Hammerers and Ironbreakers
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for Slayer, Hammerer and Ironbreaker units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Slayers, Hammerers and Ironbreakers
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Slayer, Hammerer and Ironbreaker units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 for Slayers, Hammerers and Ironbreakers
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bring More Gundpowder!
skillTree.description: Treat it with respect! This cannon has been killing grobi since your grandfather was a Shortbeard!

effects.description:
Missile damage: +4% for Canons and Organ Guns
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +5% for Canons and Organ Guns units
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +8% for Canons and Organ Guns
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +10% for Canons and Organ Guns units
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +12% for Canons and Organ Guns
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +15% for Canons and Organ Guns units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Grungni
skillTree.description: Those who pass the trials of the Ancestor God have proven their honour without question.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dawi Firepower
skillTree.description: None know the strength of the Dawi better than those who've suffered their firepower firsthand.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honoured by Grimnir
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs worship Grimnir, but only a select few warriors receive his personal recognition.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Morgrim’s Favoured
skillTree.description: Morgrim's favour is not handed out on a whim; this god blesses only the truest disciples of Dawi engineering.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Miner's Instinct
skillTree.description: This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +6%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +16%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +30%

skillTree.name: Wall Breaker
skillTree.description: "I have seen better lavatory walls than this - I'll have it down by the morrow, that's a pledge!"

effects.description:
Attrition: +5% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +8% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition: +5% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition: +5% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

skillTree.name: Pure-Beard
skillTree.description: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.

skillTree.name: Mason
skillTree.description: Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -2% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -9% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Iron-Willed
skillTree.description: Such a Dawi does not care for being wounded - by his will alone he continues to fight.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Inspirational Leader
skillTree.description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Enquiring Mind
skillTree.description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Grimnir
backgroundSkills.description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Grungni
backgroundSkills.description: This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Valaya
backgroundSkills.description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
